general.storeNotAvailable: Could not connect to the Shopware store.

errors.messageUploadFailureNotAZipFile: Uploaded file is not a ZIP file.
errors.messageUploadFailureNoPluginFoundInZipFi: No plugin found in ZIP file.
errors.messageStoreLicenseDomainMissing: Login failed. Did you provide the correct license domain from your Shopware Account in "Settings/Shopware Account"?
errors.messagePluginBaseClassNotFound: The plugin base class could not be loaded. Check your plugin composer.json regarding the class autoloading
errors.messagePluginInstallationFailed: Plugin could not be installed due to error message "{message}"
errors.messagePluginUninstallationFailed: Plugin could not be uninstalled due to error message "{message}"
errors.messagePluginActivationFailed: Plugin could not be activated due to error message "{message}"
errors.messagePluginDeactivationFailed: Plugin could not be deactivated due to error message "{message}"
errors.messageDeactivationFailedDependencies: The plugin "{dependency}" cannot be deactivated, because there are other plugins depending on it. Please deactivate the following plugins before restarting the update: {dependantNames}
errors.messagePluginUpdateFailed: Plugin could not be updated due to error message "{message}". {pluginDeactivatedHint}

store-login.headline: Shopware Account
store-login.information: The Shopware ID is your personal username that lets you log in to your Shopware Account and other Shopware services.
store-login.loginMessage: You are logged in to the Shopware Account.
store-login.labelShopwareIdHelp: Where do I find my Shopware ID?
store-login.footerNoAccount: You don't have an account yet?

list.messageDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you really want to delete this plugin?
list.messageUninstallConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall {pluginName}?
list.helpTextRemovePluginData: Warning: All data of the plugin will be removed permanently. This process is irreversible.
list.tooltipActivationDisabled: You can only activate installed plugins.

license-list.labelAccountLogin: Log in with your Shopware Account credentials
